state: Welcome to another life changing episode of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First thing I need you to do is to take a trip south. Okay, and then, make an effort to go west. And then, attempt to move south. And then, make an effort to venture east. And then, venture east. Following that, move south. And then, go south. Next, make an attempt to venture west. And then, travel south. And then, go to the east. If you can finish that, venture north. Following that, make an effort to go to the west. And then, make an attempt to travel south. Okay, and then, make an effort to travel south. Once you get around to doing that, pick-up the coin from the floor of the salon. Alright, thanks! -= Parlor =- You are in a parlor. An usual one. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. > -= Parlor =-0/1
